page.title: 17MY DAY
page.content: We open again at 6pm and we start getting busy at about 7pm. If it is nice weather we have lots of boats in. The most number of boats we have ever had in is eight. I usually go upstairs at 7.30 and watch the television. Sometimes when it is nice weather people walk from Evesham across the fields and will stand on the other side of the river and shout for the ferry. My dad or I will go over on the ferry and pick them up. We have to pull on a chain to make the ferry move . We charge them about 10p a person. During the flood about three weeks ago the ferry chain snapped.
